org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui.renderer

Class CustomListCellRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui.renderer.CustomListCellRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListCellRenderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexCellRenderer, IndexComboBoxCellRenderer, NoLeftInsetCategoryComboBoxRenderer, SchemaElementComboBoxCellRenderer

    public class CustomListCellRenderer
extends Object
implements ListCellRenderer
    A renderer used in the Control Panel that deals with CategorizedComboBoxElement elements. It can be used to render JList and JComboBoxes.
